entry.title: EXTREME COLD WARNING , Taloyoak
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 02:18 AM MST Saturday 18 February 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: Ice Crystals, -40.0°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Taloyoak Airport 07:00 AM MST Saturday 18 February 2023
Condition: Ice Crystals
Temperature: -40.0°C

Visibility: 9.7 km
Humidity: 66 %
Wind Chill: -53
Dewpoint: -44.0°C

Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Saturday: Chance of light snow. High minus 37. POP 60%
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud. 60 percent chance of light snow this morning. Ice fog patches early this morning. Wind up to 15 km/h. High minus 37. Wind chill minus 56 this morning and minus 46 this afternoon. Hazardous frostbite conditions. Forecast issued 03:00 AM MST Saturday 18 February 2023

entry.title: Saturday night: A few clouds. Temperature steady near minus 37.
